hero.subtitle: Full-stack developer
hero.text: Over 4 years of experience in the tech industry. I specialize in building innovative web and mobile applications using technologies such as React, React Native, and Node.js.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer | React, Next.js & Node.js Specialist | TypeScript | Building Modern, Scalable Interfaces
about.text: I am a Full Stack Developer with strong experience in building modern, scalable, and high-performance web applications. I specialize in React, Next.js, React Native, TypeScript, Node.js, HTML, and CSS (including Tailwind and Styled Components), with a proven track record in developing critical authentication flows, interactive dashboards, and seamless API integrations. My background includes delivering robust solutions for large-scale projects, collaborating with multidisciplinary teams, and applying best practices such as Clean Code, SOLID, and automated testing. I am committed to delivering clean, secure, and efficient code, always focused on innovation, usability, and business goals
